item.title: Swap_ecs_task_in_service
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Start another ECS task for service before stop the original task I have made an improvement to my stop ecs task Lambda function that manages my ECS service in a more graceful manner. Previously, it would stop the task associated with my ECS service to trigger a service refresh. This would result in the service being offline for a few minutes. With this improvement, it now increases the task count to 2, effectively launching a new task.
